title: WP_REST_API_Taxonomy
description: A taxonomy in a REST API context.

capabilities.description: All capabilities used by the taxonomy. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

description.description: A human-readable description of the taxonomy.

hierarchical.description: Whether or not the taxonomy should have children.

labels.description: Human-readable labels for the taxonomy for various contexts. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the taxonomy.

show_cloud.description: Whether or not the term cloud should be displayed.

rest_base.description: REST base route for the taxonomy. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

visibility.description: The visibility settings for the taxonomy. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

public.description: Whether a taxonomy is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users.

publicly_queryable.description: Whether the taxonomy is publicly queryable.

show_ui.description: Whether to generate a default UI for managing this taxonomy.

show_admin_column.description: Whether to allow automatic creation of taxonomy columns on associated post-types table.

show_in_nav_menus.description: Whether to make the taxonomy available for selection in navigation menus.

show_in_quick_edit.description: Whether to show the taxonomy in the quick/bulk edit panel.
